item.title: Public Platform of Future-Past, extended study phase. Bots, "Ar.I." & tools? | #data #monitoring #architecture - fabric | rblg
item.description:
Public Platform of Future-Past, extended study phase. Bots, "Ar.I." & tools? | #data #monitoring #architecture - fabric | rblg

Note: in the continuity of my previous post/documentation concerning the project Platform of Future-Past ( 's recent winning competition proposal), I publish additio nal images (several) and explanations about the second phase of the Platform project, for which we were mandated by Canton de Vaud (SiPAL).

item.title: (Big) Data sur la RTS | #entretien #détournements - fabric | rblg
item.description:
(Big) Data sur la RTS | #entretien #détournements - fabric | rblg

Cet entretien, qui a été enregistré en fin de semaine passée, nous verra évoquer la façon dont les artistes ou designers abordent aujourd'hui --mais aussi un peu hier-- cette question des données. En contrepoint ou complément peut-être des approches scientifiques.

item.title: I&IC at Unfrozen, Swiss Design Network 2016 Conference | #datacenter #infrastructures #research - fabric | rblg
item.description:
I&IC at Unfrozen, Swiss Design Network 2016 Conference | #datacenter #infrastructures #research - fabric | rblg

Note: I'll move this afternoon to Grandhotel Giessbach (sounds like a Wes Anderson movie) to present later tonight the temporary results of the research I'm jointly leading with Nicolas Nova for ECAL & HEAD - Genève, in partnership with EPFL-ECAL Lab & EPFL: Inhabiting and Interfacing the Cloud(s).

item.title: Platform of Future-Past by fabric | ch, architecture competition, (ex)1st price | #data #architecture #experimentation - fabric | rblg
item.description:
Platform of Future-Past by fabric | ch, architecture competition, (ex)1st price | #data #architecture #experimentation - fabric | rblg

It consisted in an evolution of a prior spatial installation entitled (pdf). A second post will follow soon with the developments of this competition proposal. Both posts will show how we try to combine small size experiments (exhibitions) with more permanent ones (architecture) in our work.

item.title: Poetics and Politics of Data, the publication | #data #clouds #society - fabric | rblg
item.description:
Poetics and Politics of Data, the publication | #data #clouds #society - fabric | rblg

Note: a book as a follow up of the exhibition for which designed the scenography last May at the Haus der elektronische Künste in Basel (project White Oblique , downloadable pdf on our website ).

item.title: I&IC at Renewable Futures Conference in Riga | #thinking #speculation #futures - fabric | rblg
item.description:
I&IC at Renewable Futures Conference in Riga | #thinking #speculation #futures - fabric | rblg

Inhabiting and Interfacing the Cloud(s)will be presented during the peer reviewed Renewable Futures Conferencenext week in Riga (Estonia), which will be the first edition of a serie that promiss to scout for radical approaches.

item.title: Datadroppers, a new (old) tool or the project of a data commune | #data #commune #service - fabric | rblg
item.description:
Datadroppers, a new (old) tool or the project of a data commune | #data #commune #service - fabric | rblg

It is a data commune, but not a "community". It is from a "market product" point of view "unsocial", almost uninteresting to later commodify.

item.title: I&IC within Poetics and Politics of Data, exhibition at H3K, scenography. Pictures | #data #research - fabric | rblg
item.description:
I&IC within Poetics and Politics of Data, exhibition at H3K, scenography. Pictures | #data #research - fabric | rblg

Note: last end of May was the opening of the exhibition Poetics & Politics of Data at the Haus der elektronischen Künste in Basel. This was the occasion to present the temporary results of the design research I'm leading at ECAL/University of Art & Design Lausanne , in collaboration with Nicolas Nova from HEAD - Genève , EPFL and EPFL-ECAL Lab .

item.title: Poetics and Politics of Data | #exhibition #data #research - fabric | rblg
item.description:
Poetics and Politics of Data | #exhibition #data #research - fabric | rblg

The exhibition „Poetics and Politics of Data" addresses the paradigm of a data-driven society and reflects life in an increasingly datified world. In visionary future scenarios, scientists enthuse over a world in which algorithms take over managing processes, envisioning a highly sensory and datafied space for us to live in, a world in which our desires and activities are anticipated, long before we carry them out.

item.title: Deterritorialized House - Inhabiting the data center, 2014 sketches... | #data #decenter #housing - fabric | rblg
item.description:
Deterritorialized House - Inhabiting the data center, 2014 sketches... | #data #decenter #housing - fabric | rblg

What is happening when you combine a fully deterritorialized program (super or hyper-modern, "non lieu", ...) with the one of the home? What might it say or comment about contemporary living?
